site.name: Horoscope.com - The Classic Free Daily Horoscope Destination
site.tagline: Free daily, weekly, and yearly horoscopes with tarot readings, numerology, games, and psychic services.
site.overview: Horoscope.com is one of the longest-running astrology websites, serving as a flagship property of Horoscope.com, Inc., a subsidiary of San Francisco-based Ingenio LLC. The site offers an extensive range of free astrological content including daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly horoscopes for all 12 zodiac signs. Beyond traditional horoscopes, users can access tarot readings, numerology reports, Chinese horoscopes, compatibility tools, and entertainment games. The platform combines playful entertainment with trusted astrological guidance, positioning itself as a comprehensive resource for self-discovery and celestial insight.

pricing.valueAssessment: Horoscope.com offers exceptional value for free users with comprehensive daily horoscopes, tarot readings, and compatibility tools at no cost. The freemium model allows casual users to access substantial content without payment. Paid products are reasonably priced compared to competitors, ranging from $9.95 for simple readings to $30.99 for comprehensive yearly forecasts. Subscription options provide savings of 16-31% for committed users. The $1 psychic reading introductory offer is competitive for trying live services. However, users should note that psychic advisors are not verified by the company, so paid live readings carry inherent quality variability.

history.story:
Horoscope.com operates as the flagship website of Horoscope.com, Inc., which functions as the media division of Ingenio LLC, a San Francisco-based company. The site has established itself as a premier destination for free horoscope content, combining entertainment with astrological guidance.

The platform's mission centers on helping users on their path to self-empowerment through a comprehensive library of tarot readings and games that provide space for users to ask their most burning questions about relationships, career, and life direction.

The team describes themselves as humble, operating with a small group of in-house editors supported by a network of freelancers. Their stated values include acting like owners, maintaining commitment to high-quality content, and challenging limiting beliefs in their exploration of astrology.

As part of the Ingenio LLC family, Horoscope.com connects to a broader network of affiliated companies operating a worldwide portfolio of brands, enabling data sharing for group operations, marketing purposes, and service improvements across platforms.

primaryUsers: Daily horoscope readers seeking quick daily guidance
Astrology enthusiasts interested in zodiac sign information
Tarot curious individuals wanting free card readings
People seeking love and relationship compatibility insights
targetAudience.idealFor:
Horoscope.com is ideal for casual astrology consumers who want quick, free access to daily horoscopes without deep astrological study. The site excels for users who check their horoscope as part of a daily routine, those curious about zodiac compatibility before a date, or people seeking lighthearted entertainment through fortune games.

The extensive free content makes it perfect for astrology beginners who want to explore without financial commitment. The variety of horoscope types (general, love, career, money, health) serves users with specific life questions. Tarot enthusiasts benefit from multiple free reading options spanning love, career, and general guidance.

Those interested in year-ahead planning will find value in the premium 2026 forecasts, while users seeking human connection can explore the live psychic services.
targetAudience.notIdealFor:
Horoscope.com may not satisfy serious astrology students seeking advanced technical analysis, detailed transit interpretations, or professional-grade chart calculations. Users wanting ad-free experiences will encounter advertising throughout the free content.

Those seeking verified, credentialed psychic advisors should note the company explicitly disclaims verification of advisor qualifications. Users preferring languages other than English or French have limited options. People wanting a modern, minimalist design may find the interface somewhat traditional.

navigation.notes: Clear mega-menu navigation with logical categorization of horoscopes, articles, tarot, games, zodiac signs, psychics, and store. Dropdown menus reveal extensive sub-options. Mobile hamburger menu maintains organization.

design.notes: Traditional astrology website aesthetic with zodiac imagery and celestial themes. Clean layout with card-based content presentation. White background with purple/gold accents maintaining readability.

mobileExperience.notes: Site adapts well to mobile viewports with touch-friendly navigation and readable text. iOS app available for tarot readings.

accessibility.notes: EqualWeb accessibility widget present in footer. Standard semantic HTML structure. Some images lack comprehensive alt text.

pageSpeed.notes: Content loads reasonably but advertising scripts may impact initial load times. Lazy loading implemented for images.

depth.notes: Daily horoscopes provide useful guidance without excessive detail. Articles section offers educational content on topics like Mercury retrograde and Saturn return. Zodiac profiles are comprehensive with multiple sub-topics.

multimedia.qualityNotes: Zodiac and tarot imagery throughout. Interactive games and calculators provide engagement. Card of the Day features visual tarot presentation.

contactability.notes: Feedback form available. Privacy policy lists phone (402-509-8598) and email (privacy@horoscope-inc.com). Physical address: 182 Howard Street #826, San Francisco, CA 94105

legitimacy.notes: Team page describes values and approach. Corporate ownership transparently disclosed. Part of established Ingenio LLC network.

legal.notes: Comprehensive privacy policy updated November 2025 with GDPR and CCPA compliance sections. Terms of service present but dated January 2016. Do Not Sell My Info option for California residents. Global Privacy Control supported.

trustCredibility.summary: Horoscope.com demonstrates strong trustworthiness through transparent corporate ownership, disclosed physical address in San Francisco, and comprehensive legal documentation including recent privacy policy updates with GDPR/CCPA compliance. The company clearly states it does not verify psychic advisor credentials, which is honest if potentially concerning for paid readings. The long-running nature of the site and backing by Ingenio LLC adds credibility.

faq.question: Is Horoscope.com free to use?
faq.answer: Yes, Horoscope.com offers extensive free content including daily horoscopes for all 12 zodiac signs, tarot card readings, compatibility calculators, numerology basics, Chinese horoscopes, and interactive games. No registration is required to access free features. Premium reports and live psychic readings are available for purchase starting at $9.95.

faq.question: Is Horoscope.com legitimate and trustworthy?
faq.answer: Horoscope.com is a legitimate website operated by Horoscope.com, Inc., a subsidiary of San Francisco-based Ingenio LLC. The company provides a physical address, phone number, and email contact. The site has been operating for many years and maintains updated privacy policies with GDPR and CCPA compliance. However, the company explicitly states it does not verify psychic advisor credentials.

faq.question: How accurate are Horoscope.com horoscopes?
faq.answer: Horoscope.com provides entertainment-focused horoscopes written by their editorial team and freelance network. The site explicitly states in its terms of service that content is provided for entertainment purposes. Accuracy depends on individual belief in astrology, and the company makes no guarantees about predictions or advice.

faq.question: Does Horoscope.com offer free tarot readings?
faq.answer: Yes, Horoscope.com offers multiple free tarot reading options including daily tarot, love tarot (daily love tarot, true love tarot, love potential tarot), forecast tarot (today/tomorrow tarot, monthly tarot), and unique readings (angel tarot, past lives tarot, yes/no tarot). Premium tarot readings are also available for purchase.

faq.question: What is the $1 psychic reading on Horoscope.com?
faq.answer: Horoscope.com offers an introductory $1 for 5-minute live psychic reading through their partner network. This promotional offer allows new users to try live psychic consultations at minimal cost. Users can choose from categories including love and sex, general psychics, and tarot readers. Note that advisors are not employees of Horoscope.com and their credentials are not verified.

faq.question: Does Horoscope.com have a mobile app?
faq.answer: Horoscope.com offers a Yes/No Tarot Instant Answer app available on the Apple App Store for iOS devices. The main website is also mobile-responsive and can be accessed through any mobile browser for horoscopes, tarot, and other features.

faq.question: What zodiac signs does Horoscope.com cover?
faq.answer: Horoscope.com covers all 12 zodiac signs: Aries (March 21 - April 19), Taurus (April 20 - May 20), Gemini (May 21 - June 20), Cancer (June 21 - July 22), Leo (July 23 - August 22), Virgo (August 23 - September 22), Libra (September 23 - October 22), Scorpio (October 23 - November 21), Sagittarius (November 22 - December 21), Capricorn (December 22 - January 19), Aquarius (January 20 - February 18), and Pisces (February 19 - March 20).

faq.question: Can I get a free birth chart on Horoscope.com?
faq.answer: Yes, Horoscope.com offers a free birth chart generator that creates a natal chart based on your birth date, time, and location. For more detailed birth chart analysis and interpretation, premium birth chart readings are available for $27.99.

summary.recommendation:
Horoscope.com stands as a reliable, established destination for free daily horoscopes and astrological entertainment. With decades of operation and backing from Ingenio LLC, the site offers one of the most comprehensive free astrology experiences available online. Users can access daily horoscopes, multiple tarot reading options, compatibility tools, and entertaining fortune games without registration or payment.

The site is ideal for casual astrology enthusiasts, daily horoscope readers, and anyone curious about zodiac signs or tarot. The breadth of free content makes it an excellent starting point for astrology beginners, while the paid store offers reasonably priced premium reports for those wanting deeper insights. The $1 introductory psychic reading provides low-risk access to live consultations.

Users seeking advanced astrological analysis, verified psychic credentials, or ad-free experiences should look elsewhere. The psychic services explicitly lack credential verification, and advertising supports the extensive free content. Those preferring modern, minimalist designs may find the traditional aesthetic dated.

With an overall rating of 7.8/10, Horoscope.com earns its place as a go-to free horoscope resource. The exceptional value for free users, comprehensive feature set, and established credibility outweigh the drawbacks of advertising and unverified psychic services. For daily horoscope checking and casual astrological exploration, few sites match its breadth and accessibility.
